to_v3: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS settings;CREATE TABLE settings (imperial int DEFAULT 0, firstdive int default 1);INSERT INTO settings (imperial, firstdive) VALUES (0,1);
to_v4: ALTER TABLE tanks RENAME COLUMN tankindex TO `index`
to_v5: ALTER TABLE dives ADD COLUMN tanks TEXT
to_v6: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS statistics; CREATE TABLE statistics (type varchar(255), value varchar(255), diveid INTEGER);
to_v7: CREATE TABLE profile (username varchar(255), firstname varchar(255), lastname varchar(255), profilePictureUrl varchar(500));
to_v8: ALTER TABLE settings ADD COLUMN forceSync boolean DEFAULT 0
